summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Logan Review Date: 2017/05/30 Store: Hugh Jackman (Actor), Patrick Stewart (Actor), James Mangold (Director) & 0 more Rated: R Format: Blu-ray Categories: Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies Product Description: ["It's the year 2029, and much of the world's mutant population has succumbed to a genocidal, man-made virus. As a down-and-out Logan (Hugh Jackman, in his final appearance as the character) comes to terms with his failing healing factor, he and an ailing Charles Xavier (Patrick Stewart) must protect Laura (Dafne Keen)-a young genetically bred mutant with powers similar to Logan's-from the evil organization that created her. With Richard E. Grant, Boyd Holbrook, Stephen Merchant."] Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Action & Adventure/Superheroes', 'Format': 'AC-3, Box set, Dolby, DTS Surround Sound, Dubbed, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Patrick Stewart, Hugh Jackman, James Mangold', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Surround)', 'Runtime': '137 minutes', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'R (Restricted)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 0.01 Ounces', 'Director': 'James Mangold', 'Media Format': 'AC-3, Box set, Dolby, DTS Surround Sound, Dubbed, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Run time': '137 minutes', 'Release date': 'May 23, 2017', 'Actors': 'Hugh Jackman, Patrick Stewart', 'Dubbed': 'French, Spanish', 'Subtitles': 'Spanish, English, French', 'Studio': '20th Century Fox', 'Number of discs': '3'} Review Text: It would have been helpful if they would have indicated it was in the future at the beginning of the film. Review Title: Great Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Spirited Away [Blu-ray] Review Date: 2017/05/30 Store: Daveigh Chase (Actor), Lauren Holly (Actor), Hayao Miyazaki (Director) & 0 more Rated: PG Format: Blu-ray Categories: Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies Product Description: ["From Hayao Miyazaki, one of the most celebrated filmmakers in the history of animated cinema, comes the Oscar(R)-winning triumph (2002, Best Animated Feature Film), filled with astonishing beauty and epic adventure, a dazzling masterpiece for the ages. SPIRITED AWAY is a wondrous fantasy about a young girl, Chihiro, trapped in a strange new world of spirits. When her parents undergo a mysterious transformation, she must call on the courage she never knew she had to free herself and return her family to the outside world. an unforgettable story, brimming with creativity, SPIRITED AWAY will take you on a journey beyond your imagination. It's a fantastic tale the whole family will want to experience over and over again on Disney Blu-ray!"] Average Rating: 4.9 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Action & Adventure', 'Format': 'AC-3, DTS Surround Sound, Dubbed, NTSC, Subtitled', 'Contributor': 'Michael Chiklis, Tara Strong, Susan Egan, Lauren Holly, Suzanne Pleshette, David Ogden Stiers, Hayao Miyazaki, John Ratzenberger, Original Story And Screenplay By Hayao Miyazaki, Daveigh Chase, Jason MardsenMichael Chiklis, Tara Strong, Susan Egan, Lauren Holly, Suzanne Pleshette, David Ogden Stiers, Hayao Miyazaki, John Ratzenberger, Original Story And Screenplay By Hayao Miyazaki, Daveigh Chase, Jason Mardsen See more', 'Language': 'Japanese (Dolby Digital 5.1), French (Dolby Digital 5.1), English (DTS-HD High Res Audio)', 'Runtime': '2 hours and 5 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.85:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG (Parental Guidance Suggested)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 0.63 Ounces', 'Item model number': '12670900', 'Director': 'Hayao Miyazaki', 'Media Format': 'AC-3, DTS Surround Sound, Dubbed, NTSC, Subtitled', 'Run time': '2 hours and 5 minutes', 'Release date': 'June 16, 2015', 'Actors': 'Daveigh Chase, Lauren Holly, Michael Chiklis, Suzanne Pleshette, Jason Mardsen', 'Dubbed': 'French, Japanese', 'Subtitles': 'French, English', 'Studio': 'Walt Disney Home Entertainment Presents A Studio Ghibli Film', 'Writers': 'Original Story And Screenplay By Hayao Miyazaki', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: I had film on DVD but wanted to see if blue ray was sharper. It does seem to be. Such an imaginative film. I think everyone should see it. Review Title: I had film on DVD but wanted to see if ... Review Title: Five Stars Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Doctor Who: S10 Part1 (BD) Review Date: 2017/11/09 Store: Various (Actor, Director) Format: Blu-ray Categories: Movies & TV, Blu-ray, TV Product Description: ['Doctor Who: S10 Part1 (BD)', 'Doctor Who Series 10 will see Peter Capaldi embark on his thrilling final chapter as the Twelfth Doctor as well as the introduction of brand new companion Pearl Mackie as Bill Potts and the return of Matt Lucas as Nardole. Fantastic adventures and terrifying monsters await the team of heroes as they journey through space and time in this latest instalment of the globally-renowned drama. Its ok. Review Title: Three Stars Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Assassin’s Creed: Lineage Review Date: 2018/03/16 Store: Romano Orzari (Actor), Yves Simoneau (Director) Rated: NR Format: Blu-ray Categories: Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies Product Description: ["ASSASSIN’S CREED: LINEAGE is the first chapter of Ezio Auditore’s story and the prequel movie to Assassin’s Creed II, Assassin’s Creed: Brotherhood, and Assassin’s Creed: Revelations video games. ASSASSIN’S CREED: LINEAGE reveals the machinations of 15th-century Italy through the actions of Ezio's father, Giovanni. When the Duke of Milan is brutally murdered, the Assassin Giovanni Auditore is dispatched to investigate. What he uncovers implicates Italy's most powerful families reaching all the way back to the Vatican itself. As Giovanni draws closer to the truth, he becomes hunted himself. He must expose the conspirators before he joins their ever-growing list of victims."] Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Action & Adventure', 'Format': 'Digital Sound, Color, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Romano Orzari, Yves Simoneau', 'Language': 'English', 'Runtime': '36 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '2.35:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'NVGBR256051', 'Director': 'Yves Simoneau', 'Media Format': 'Digital Sound, Color, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Run time': '36 minutes', 'Release date': 'November 15, 2011', 'Actors': 'Romano Orzari', 'Studio': 'Flatiron Film Company', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: I thought it would be as good as Assassins Creed but it isn't. Its mostly geared to the game. Review Title: Two Stars Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Doctor Who: The Complete Eleventh Series (Blu-ray) Review Date: 2019/01/05 Store: Various (Actor, Director) Rated: NR Format: Blu-ray Categories: Movies & TV, Blu-ray, TV Product Description: ['The brand new series of Doctor Who marks the arrival of Jodie Whittaker, the 13th Doctor – a super-smart force of nature – alongside a new team of friends. Already highly anticipated, the new-look series heralds a brand-new era for Doctor Who with a world-class team at the helm led by showrunner Chris Chibnall. The show will be full of action and adventure, humor and thrills, an unmissable adventure across all of space and time.'] Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Drama, Science Fiction', 'Format': 'NTSC, Blu-ray', 'Contributor': 'Various', 'Language': 'English', 'Number Of Discs': '3', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 3.53 Ounces', 'Director': 'Various', 'Media Format': 'NTSC, Blu-ray', 'Run time': '8 hours and 41 minutes', 'Release date': 'January 29, 2019', 'Actors': 'Various', 'Studio': 'Studio Distribution Services', 'Number of discs': '3'} Review Text: I absolutely love the new Doctor. I think most of the new story lines are well conceive and written. Way to go BBC. I noticed there are a lot of nay sayers about the new doctor. Not sure why, I can't see any of their criticism. I think its a lot like trying to talk to a trump supporter, they don't make any sense. Just saying . . . . . They are very through and enjoyable. Review Title: just as good as always! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Carl Sagan's Cosmos - Ultimate Edition (Digitally Remastered) Review Date: 2019/06/29 Store: Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Fully Loaded DVDs, Ultimate Editions Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.5 x 5.3 x 0.7 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'Number of discs': '5'} Review Text: I really like be able to re-watch Carl Sagan's Cosmos. I gave it 4 stars because of what i see as a production issue. The music is so loud it often drowns out Dr Sagan's voice so you have to listen several times to understand what he is saying. If you run your dvd player through a sound system you will be able to bring his voice up to a volume easily heard. Very glad I bought it. Review Title: Good show Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: CHRISTOPHER ROBIN Review Date: 2019/06/29 Store: Ewan McGregor (Actor), Hayley Atwell (Actor), Marc Forster (Director) & 0 more Rated: PG Format: Blu-ray Categories: Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies Product Description: ["In this heartwarming tale from Disney, Christopher Robin, the boy who had countless adventures in the Hundred Acre Wood, has grown up and lost his way. Now it's up to his spirited and loveable stuffed animals, Winnie The Pooh, Tigger, Piglet, and the rest of the gang, to rekindle their friendship and remind him of endless days of childlike wonder and make-believe, when doing nothing was the very best something."] Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Drama', 'Format': 'NTSC, Subtitled', 'Contributor': 'Toby Jones, Screenplay by Alex Ross Perry and Allison Schroede, Jim Cummings, Story By Alex Ross Perry, Based on Characters Created by A.A. Milne and E.H., Brad Garrett, Bronte Carmichael, Ewan McGregor, Peter Capaldi, Mark Gatiss, Sophie Okonedo, Hayley Atwell, W… See more', 'Language': 'English (DTS-HD High Res Audio), English (Dolby Digital 2.0), French (Dolby Digital 5.1), Spanish (Dolby Digital 5.1)', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 44 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '2.39:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG (Parental Guidance Suggested)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 1.92 Ounces', 'Director': 'Marc Forster', 'Media Format': 'NTSC, Subtitled', 'Run time': '1 hour and 44 minutes', 'Release date': 'November 6, 2018', 'Actors': 'Ewan McGregor, Hayley Atwell, Jim Cummings, Brad Garrett, Mark Gatiss', 'Dubbed': 'French, Spanish', 'Subtitles': 'Spanish, French, English', 'Studio': 'WALT DISNEY PICTURES', 'Writers': 'Screenplay by Alex Ross Perry and Allison Schroede, Story By Alex Ross Perry, Based on Characters Created by A.A. Milne and E.H.', 'Number of discs': '2'} Review Text: Love the portrayal of Christopher Robin all grown up. Gave me the same soothing feeling reading Winnie the Pooh stories have always done. Review Title: Really good extension of the Pooh stories Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2020/05/05 Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Stewart McPherson'], 'Producers': ['Stewart McPherson'], 'Starring': ['Stewart McPherson'], 'Studio': ['FilmRise']} Review Text: McPherson't hero worship of Shackleton put the creditability of the other episodes into question. If Captain Worsley hadn't been on that expedition Shackleton and all of the men would most likely not have survived. I will watch the other episodes but with a grain of salt. PS Glad David Tennent got to be ginger! Review Title: throughly entertaining. Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
This individual displays a strong preference for high-quality cinematic experiences, as indicated by consistently high ratings (above 4.6) across various titles. Their tastes lean heavily toward adventurous genres, particularly science fiction, action, and animated films, demonstrating an affinity for imaginative storytelling and character-driven narratives. 

Recurring sentiments highlight a keen appreciation for renowned creators and actors, especially in fantasy and animated films, suggesting a preference for established franchises and acclaimed directors. The emphasis on Blu-ray formats implies a notable quality sensitivity, with a desire for sharper visuals and superior audio experiences.

This customer is somewhat price-sensitive, evidenced by varied ratings on less favorable purchases, such as a film starring a popular actor that did not meet expectations. They also express frustration when products did not align with their perceptions based on previous experiences in related genres.

Overall, this person's core preferences indicate an enthusiasm for engaging, thought-provoking, and visually captivating films, resulting in repeated purchases from known brands that offer quality entertainment while exhibiting openness toward new titles that garner high praise.

target_interaction.title: Only watching the first episode, so not more stars.
target_interaction.text: I like the first part of this episode but I find it very disconcerting that Jean Reno doesn't sound himself.
